title: Welcome Home
description: alt cover for B00512EEEAhttp://www.amazon.com/dp/B00512EEEAJohn Lester is returning to a place he never really considered home to begin with, a place that he has not seen in years. But what he does not realize is that what went on in this house was much less homely than he thought as he unearths something dark about his family."Welcome Home" is a short story approximately 6600 words.Welcome Home can also be found in the collection of stories: Counterphobia: A Collection of Horror.
author: Will Hage
